narrative.narrative: Royal Bengal Airline operated from January 31st,2008 to sometime around October 2009. It was based at Dhaka,Bangladesh and flew domestic routes to Chittagong,Cox's Bazar and Sylhet. Sylhet had been operated for awhile but the route was cut sometime in early 2009 and Cox's Bazar was started. It had one Bombardier Dash 8-100 its whole life that was delivered before the airline began flying in October 2007 from Cirrus Airlines,which seated 37 passengers. The airline itself was owned by a British company based in London, and its owners were British born and living in Sylhet. It had planned on getting planes that could fly between Bangladesh and the UK.
